data.question: What is the yield percentage of the chemically functionalizable nanoporous material [Cu3(TMA)2(H2O)3]n?
What is the maximum temperature at which the framework of [Cu3(TMA)2(H2O)3]n remains stable?
What is the BET surface area of HKUST-1 as determined by N2 adsorption/desorption isotherm study?
What is the role of high temperature in the synthesis of HKUST-1?
data.answer: High temperature promotes the formation of polymer frameworks of higher dimensionality through the loss of terminal ancillary ligands.

data.question: Is the Cu-Cu internuclear separation in HKUST-1 shorter than the distance across the diagonal of its nanochannels?
Can the aqua ligands in HKUST-1 be replaced by other groups for chemical functionalization?
What is the effect of replacing the aqua ligands in HKUST-1 with pyridine?
data.answer: It results in the formation of a green derivative [Cu3(TMA)2(py)3]n z0.5pyz2H2O.

data.question: What is the accessible porosity percentage of HKUST-1?
Does the synthesis of HKUST-1 involve the use of a Te(cid:223)on-lined Parr pressure vessel?
What is the role of DMF or DMSO in the synthesis of HKUST-1?
data.answer: They act as crystallizing solvents that afford phase-pure solids isostructural with HKUST-1.

data.question: Is the structure of HKUST-1 cubic?
What is the significance of the octahedral unit in the structure of HKUST-1?
data.answer: It serves as a secondary building unit that allows for the formation of large-sized cavity through corner sharing of the octahedra.

data.question: Can the thermal stability of HKUST-1 be increased by substituting Cu with more oxophilic metals?
What is the weight loss percentage of HKUST-1 upon dehydration by heating to 100°C in air?
What is the effect of solvothermal chemistry on the dimensionality of the copper trimesate system?
data.answer: It resulted in the discovery of HKUST-1 with reduced number of ancillary aqua ligands to just one per metal center.

data.question: Does the structure of HKUST-1 allow for the direct incorporation of catalytic sites?
What is the formula unit of HKUST-1?
What is the significance of the tetracarboxylate unit in the structure of HKUST-1?
data.answer: It provides a structural motif with potential fourfold symmetry.

data.question: Is the framework of HKUST-1 electrically neutral?
What is the role of polyfunctional ligands in the synthesis of metal coordination polymers?
data.answer: They are used to control dimensionality, but ancillary ligation by water or other solvent ligands may result in low dimensionality.
